title: Ryze sucks
body:
ryze has 43 % winrate and ryze's pick rate is 1.23%. I barely see anyone play ryze in solo que i think im the only one playing ryze because sometimes i just feel like playing ryze but when i'm in game i made  a really bad decision this happens to me everytime. 
Playing ryze sucks because of the nerf that riot did with his e and ryze can't even solo kill someone in lane. ryze ult is nothing ( useless lvl 6 ), no damage all it does in teleport you and most of the time it can lead your team to bad spot. even when you do a full combo using ryze you cant even kill. and as a midlaner you always go for the adc in team fight but on ryze you just can't because you can only use your ew and if you q they're just gonna block it . If you e q a tank in team fight and try to kill it first because you cant reach the adc you're team i just gonna be mad at you for attacking the tank  they're just gonna be like "gg this mid sucks" "delete the game" "trash".

replies.body: Hahah I just played a game as Ryze because I hadn't seen him in forever and I wanted to see how he performs, turns out his early game damage is horrible and unless he's ahead he barely makes a difference in a team fight.
